name: OSCELOT DSKTOOL
description: A Djago/Python-based version of the Original York DSK tool.

BLACKBOARD_LEARN_INSTANCE.description: The FQDN for your Blackboard Learn instance. E.g.: demo.blackboard.com. Do NOT include the protocol (http:// or https://)

APPLICATION_KEY.description: Paste the APPLICATION KEY provided when you registered your Application in the Blackboard Developer Portal.

APPLICATION_SECRET.description: Paste the APPLICATION SECRET provided when you registered your Application

DISABLE_COLLECTSTATIC.description: Leave this set as is for successful deploy.
